body_html:
Hi,

Please use the forum to ask questions, github issues are for bug/feature only.

Numpy only support cpu, so send the tensor to the cpu with .cpu() then call .numpy() on it to get a numpy array.
body_text:
Hi,
Please use the forum to ask questions, github issues are for bug/feature only.
Numpy only support cpu, so send the tensor to the cpu with .cpu() then call .numpy() on it to get a numpy array.
body:
Hi,

Please use the [forum](https://discuss.pytorch.org/) to ask questions, github issues are for bug/feature only.

Numpy only support cpu, so send the tensor to the cpu with `.cpu()` then call `.numpy()` on it to get a numpy array.
